name: repetitio
description: Repetitio - Desktop application for spaced repetition learning
author: Morozhnikova Larisa

scripts.app:dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter backend run electron:dev" "pnpm --filter frontend run dev" -n "backend,frontend" -c "green,blue"
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter frontend run dev" "pnpm --filter backend run dev" -n "frontend,backend" -c "blue,green"
scripts.bundle: pnpm --filter frontend run build && pnpm --filter backend run dist
scripts.lint: pnpm -r --if-present run lint && npm run lint:md
scripts.format: pnpm -r --if-present run format && npm run format:md
